abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performance by pianist Yuja Wang at Carnegie Hall.
snippet: Yuja Wang gave her much-anticipated New York recital debut at Carnegie Hall on Thursday, playing pieces by Scriabin, Prokofiev and Liszt.
lead_paragraph: Yuja Wang gave her much-anticipated New York recital debut at Carnegie Hall on Thursday, playing pieces by Scriabin, Prokofiev and Liszt.

headline.seo: Yuja Wang at Carnegie Hall - Review
